AltName.entry: PRINCESS ROYAL TRUST SHEFFIELD CARERS CENTRE, THE

Desc.entry: Provides help and information for all carers and former carers, whatever the condition or disability of the person being cared for. Also provides information for professionals working with carers and raises awareness of carers' issues and their contributions to community care. Helps carers with applications to Sheffield City Council's Carers Flexible Breaks Fund. Offers a range of therapeutic and recreational activities including aromatherapy, parent carers group and an art group. Offers TLC, a Telephone Linkline for Carers, which aims to reach isolated or housebound carers to provide social contact, volunteers ring carers fortnightly for a chat. Company limited by guarantee no 2966792. Self or any referral.
